title: How Jim Grimsley Shed His 'Racist' Skin
teaser: In 1966, Jim Grimsley's North Carolina school was integrated. NPR's Tamara Keith talks to Grimsley and one of his first black classmates, Donnie Meadows, about Grimsley's book, How I Shed My Skin.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
